subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: While his Mets teammates smacked around Colorado pitchers for 25 runs in three games, Shawn Green was hitless in his final 10 at-bats at Coors Field.
snippet: While his Mets teammates smacked around Colorado pitchers for 25 runs in three games, Shawn Green was hitless in his final 10 at-bats at Coors Field.
